Field Label: Record ID
STOP! Only data in Record ID 1 will be used for the Settings project. You are currently in Record ID [record_id].

Logo Image
to be displayed in top left of Data Model Browser page. Recommended dimensions (100x40px)
Consortium, Working Group, or Team Name

Logo Favicon (browser tab picture)
small square image

Header Title
to be displayed in the menu bar, to the right of the logo, and in the page tab.

Page Text Title
to be displayed at the top of the main text section.

Page Descriptive Text
to be displayed underneath the Page Text Title. Can include HTML.
File name (descriptive)

Download text
Text for the user to click on to download the file, e.g. "Download PDF"
Document or file

File upload category (optional)
This variable can be revised (category names) or ignored as appropriate for the data model.
Date of file upload

REDCap username of person uploading file
for logging purposes

Logo for the PDF
high-resolution JPEG recommended.

PDF Title
to be displayed at the top of the PDF.

PDF Subtitle
to be displayed in the PDF underneath the title.

PDF Page Text
to be displayed on the front page of the PDF. Can include basic HTML.

Section Header: Current Data Model PDF (and associated files)
Field Label: Datetime of last PDF update

Data Model PDF (most recently generated copy)
Generating this file on the fly when users request a download can take a long time, so it is necessary to pre-generate and save the Data Model PDF each time the data model is revised.

JSON File Variable Search File
This file pre-parses the data model contents and enables responsive variable search.

Regenerate the PDF immediately

Check this box and save the record in order to force the Data Model PDF and JSON to regenerate immediately. This option will take a few minutes and the checkbox will be unchecked when the process is done. You will need to refresh the page to see changes.

List of email subscribers for PDF Updates
These users will receive email notifications every time the PDF is regenerated. Separate email addresses with semi-colon (;)

List of emails subscribers for Data Model/Code List Updates
These users will receive email notifications every time data in the Data Model or the Code Lists sub-projects are updated. Separate email addresses with semi-colon (;)
